native_name: {{ubl|native name|lo|ສາທາລະນະລັດ ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ ປະຊາຊົນລາວ<wbr />|''Sathalanalat Paxathipatai Paxaxon Lao'' |small|([[Romanization of Lao|Lao romanisation]])|native name|fr|République démocratique populaire lao}} {{native name|lo|ສາທາລະນະລັດ ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ ປະຊາຊົນລາວ<wbr />}} {{small|([[Romanization of Lao|Lao romanisation]])}} {{native name|fr|République démocratique populaire lao}}
national_motto:
" {{lang|lo|ສັນຕິພາບ ເອກະລາດ ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ ເອກະພາບ ວັດທະນະຖາວອນ}} "
"''Santiphab ekalad pasathipatai ekaphab vadtha na thauaon''" {{small|(Lao romanisation)}}
" {{lang|fr|Paix, indépendance, démocratie, unité et prospérité}} "
{{small|(|lang-en|"Peace, independence, democracy, unity and prosperity"|)}} {{lang-en|"Peace, independence, democracy, unity and prosperity"}} )
national_anthem:
"[[Pheng Xat Lao]]"
{{small|(|lang-en|"Lao National Anthem"|)}}
[[File:National Anthem of Laos.ogg|center]]
{{lang-en|"Lao National Anthem"}} )
